data.lyric:
[ti:On My Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:On My Side (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]On My Side (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:00.91]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Leor Shevah/Ethan Hayes/Jason Goldberg
[00:01.82]Leor light it up
[00:02.95]
[00:04.57]What's up Haze
[00:06.30]
[00:10.51]Huh huh huh
[00:11.63]Huh ridin' in that motherf**kin' skrrt skrrt vroom
[00:14.94]Shawty on my side and she don't want me to lose
[00:17.44]I can't make this up 'bout how I came through shinin'
[00:21.59]Yeah you knowin' how I do
[00:23.25]Actin' crazy in this b***h like I belong on the news
[00:26.00]Turnin' up up in this b***h like I'm a motherf**kin' fool
[00:28.87]I go dumb up in this b***h I go to wavin' with my tool
[00:31.82]For big dump I really miss I got them bodies two by two ha
[00:35.18]Time to head home baby what that s*x 'bout
[00:37.70]Okay
[00:38.13]Have your head on baby lose that cell phone
[00:40.43]Okay
[00:40.91]We f**k to flash she let me hit it in my VLONE
[00:43.69]One-fifty units I just need to get a big loan
[00:45.89]Cards like its real estate n***a back it down
[00:48.57]Soon as that chopper bang gravediggin' 4K Trey
[00:51.38]N***a this a shotta's chain
[00:52.90]Real killer don't play with children 'fore I had fire at five brains
[00:55.75]Do the dash on po' trucks engines hit it this b***h insane
[00:58.41]P***y n***a mad about my millions can't talk wit' 'em sane
[01:01.34]Comprehension with no understandin' they don't know what I'm sayin'
[01:04.31]How we wait outside but analyze
[01:05.96]One meaningless diamond chain spinnin' 'bout our dead brother name
[01:08.84]Huh ridin' in that motherf**kin' skrrt skrrt vroom
[01:12.03]Shawty on my side and she don't want me to lose
[01:14.44]I can't make this up 'bout how I came through shinin'
[01:18.95]Yeah you knowin' how I do
[01:20.15]I knock s**t off as soon as it's up they need to put me in a zoo
[01:23.08]I got big bank plenty money and my sons too
[01:25.89]We throw sticks like they baboons got my blick in New York like Woo
[01:28.85]Cousin lit they call him Skelly just wan' crash when Top say shoot
[01:31.59]Play with that dog food like my cousin profit jump back up in two
[01:34.57]Prophet preachin' to the youth all that lame s**t we don't do
[01:37.36]F**k n***as hatin'-a*s who you kill
[01:38.92]Protect your gang bang with your crew
[01:40.20]Me and my mains we out the roof I'm screamin' "B***h what you wan' do"
[01:43.53]GTR I'ma turn this b***h into a slider
[01:46.18]I f**k with her take her out to Shyne flood her with diamonds
[01:48.93]I'm gon' murder someone pray that I just don't have to remind her
[01:51.54]I ain't got no work on me real fast in that foreign how I be drivin'
[01:54.47]We killed him we slimed him right we slimed him in that motherf**kin' ooh
[01:57.08]I'm by my lonely probably two guns on me
[01:58.81]Yeah ridin' in the coupe
[02:00.06]Shawty know I'm high in this motherf**ker want me to get her high too
[02:02.95]Tryna tell you they can be with it I'm already on that
[02:05.07]
[02:05.89]Huh ridin' in that motherf**kin' skrrt skrrt vroom
[02:09.20]Shawty on my side and she don't want me to lose
[02:11.62]I can't make this up 'bout how I came through shinin'
[02:15.91]Yeah you knowin' how I do
data.trans:
[ti:On My Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:On My Side (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.91]//
[00:01.82]Leor Shevah制作
[00:02.95]
[00:04.57]Haze制作
[00:06.30]
[00:10.51]//
[00:11.63]驾车狂飙
[00:14.94]妹子站在我这一边 她不想让我失败
[00:17.44]我无法捏造我如何引人瞩目的事实
[00:21.59]你知道我努力拼搏
[00:23.25]做出疯狂的举动 好像我应该是登上新闻一样
[00:26.00]在这里尽情狂欢 好像我是个傻瓜一样
[00:28.87]我装傻充愣 我挥舞着我的武器
[00:31.82]因为我十分想念Dump 我让敌人两个接着两个地倒下
[00:35.18]回家的时间已到 宝贝 纵享欢愉怎么样
[00:37.70]好的
[00:38.13]让你心醉神迷 宝贝 丢掉那个手机
[00:40.43]好的
[00:40.91]我们尽情缠绵 她让我穿着VLONE的衣服肆意放纵
[00:43.69]价值不菲的行头 我需要拿到一大笔贷款
[00:45.89]银行卡就像不动产一样 哥们 后退一步
[00:48.57]只要枪声响起 挖掘坟墓 所向披靡的4K Trey帮
[00:51.38]哥们 这是价值连城的项链
[00:52.90]真正的杀手 在我必须干掉五个人之前 不要招惹孩子
[00:55.75]驾车狂飙 引擎轰鸣 这个妹子失去理智
[00:58.41]自不量力的家伙嫉妒我的百万身家 无法理智地跟他们交谈
[01:01.34]没有丝毫理解能力 他们不知道我在说什么
[01:04.31]我们怎么能在外等候
[01:05.96]围绕着我们死去兄弟的名字 分析着一条毫无意义的项链
[01:08.84]驾车狂飙
[01:12.03]妹子站在我这一边 她不想让我失败
[01:14.44]我无法捏造我如何引人瞩目的事实
[01:18.95]你知道我努力拼搏
[01:20.15]只要结束 我就大干一场 他们需要把我关进动物园里
[01:23.08]我在银行里存着大把钞票 我的孩子也腰缠万贯
[01:25.89]我们大打出手 就像他们是狒狒一样 带着枪在纽约招摇过市 就像本地的帮派一样
[01:28.85]表弟欣喜若狂 别人把他叫做Skelly 当我下令开枪时 只想横冲直撞
[01:31.59]就像我表弟一样玩着那种玩意 转眼之间赚到盆满钵满
[01:34.57]先知向年轻人灌输思想 我们不会干那些龌龊的事
[01:37.36]卑鄙小人 怀恨在心的家伙 你夺走谁的性命
[01:38.92]保护着你的帮派 与你的团队一起倾泻火力
[01:40.20]我和我的朋友将身体探出车外 我呐喊着 你想做什么
[01:43.53]犹如赛车游戏一般 我让这个女孩释放天性 
[01:46.18]我和她在一起 带她去找Shyne 让她戴上闪闪发光的钻石
[01:48.93]我要大开杀戒 祈祷我不用提醒她
[01:51.54]我无所事事 开着进口豪车飞速狂奔
[01:54.47]我们干掉他 我们在这里把他玩弄于股掌之间
[01:57.08]我形单影只 也许随身带着两把枪
[01:58.81]开着跑车驰骋
[02:00.06]妹子知道我已经嗨到不能自已 想让我给她带来兴奋的感觉
[02:02.95]想要告诉你 他们心知肚明 我已经全情投入
[02:05.07]
[02:05.89]驾车狂飙
[02:09.20]妹子站在我这一边 她不想让我失败
[02:11.62]我无法捏造我如何引人瞩目的事实
[02:15.91]你知道我努力拼搏
